miniapp.name: Ride or Die Top 8
miniapp.subtitle: Your Crypto Roller Coaster Crew
miniapp.description: Discover your longest-standing Farcaster friends on the crypto roller coaster! Find your Bitcoin bros who've been riding the ups and downs with you.
